segments.text: Maybe you'll get another chance at the statue .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't think so . Did you ever go and look at your stamp ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And let them ruin my life ? Forget it !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But you've been looking for that stamp for years .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's not worth it . Besides , I have to save up to pay for some bills .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Bummer . I guess we're both out of luck .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah . Well , I'll see you this weekend .
segments.speaker: S1
